title: Debt to the Dead
overview: When the son of a powerful politician vanishes in Mexico City, the authorities turn to Zuzunaga—a man known for his sharp instincts and unorthodox, often law-bending methods. Once a legendary figure in solving high-profile cases, Zuzunaga is brought back into the spotlight, his reputation as the last hope to uncover the truth and deliver justice, no matter the cost.
